hardware.title: core
hardware.description: Hardware design files for the Spark Core, our TI CC3000 Wi-Fi development toolkit and reference design.

hardware.title: photon
hardware.description: Hardware design files for the Photon, our Broadcom 43362 development toolkit and reference design.

hardware.title: electron
hardware.description: Hardware design files for the Electron, our cellular development toolkit and reference design.

firmware.title: firmware
firmware.description: Firmware for the Core, Photon, and Electron.

firmware.title: core-common-lib
firmware.description: Common libraries and drivers for the Spark Core (STM32+CC3000).

firmware.title: core-communication-lib
firmware.description: Embedded C++ library for communicating with the Spark Cloud.

cloud.title: spark-server
cloud.description: An API compatible open source server for interacting with devices speaking the Spark protocol.

cloud.title: spark-protocol
cloud.description: A Node.js module for hosting direct encrypted CoAP socket connections with Sparky things.

mobile.title: android-app
mobile.description: The Spark Core Android app, which acts as a template for Android apps for other Spark-powered products.

mobile.title: ios-app
mobile.description: The Spark Core iOS app, which acts as a template for iOS apps for other Spark-powered products.

dev.title: spark-dev
dev.description: Professional IDE for Particle, based on GitHub's Atom project.

dev.title: particle-cli
dev.description: Command Line Interface (CLI) for interacting with the Particle Cloud, Core, Photon, and Electron.

dev.title: docs
dev.description: Documentation for the Particle Cloud and Particle devices.
